title: error updating 5.0.6 -> 5.0.7
body:
hi,
i tried updating owncloud from the aministrator account and got this error:

```
aktualisiere owncloud auf version 5.0.7. dies kã¶nnte eine weile dauern.

turned on maintenance mode
failed to get existing database structure for updating (mdb2_schema error: schema validation error, default value of "visitor_localtime" is incorrect: "" is not of type "time")

the update was unsuccessful. please report this issue to the owncloud community.
```
i do not use 3rd party apps, it was a fresh installation of  oc 5.0.6 with mysql5.5.28 and php 5.3.10

owncloud log
```
{"app":"core","message":"starting upgrade from 5.0.8 to 5.0.12","level":2,"time":1370864174}
{"app":"php","message":"non-static method mdb2_schema::errormessage() should not be called statically, assuming $this from incompatible context at \/kunden\/344719_91058\/tools\/cloud\/3rdparty\/mdb2\/schema.php#2794","level":2,"time":1370864176}
{"app":"php","message":"non-static method mdb2_schema::errormessage() should not be called statically, assuming $this from incompatible context at \/kunden\/344719_91058\/tools\/cloud\/3rdparty\/mdb2\/schema.php#2794","level":2,"time":1370864176}
{"app":"core","message":"failed to get existing database structure for updating (mdb2_schema error: schema validation error, default value of \"visitor_localtime\" is incorrect: \"\" is not of type \"time\")","level":4,"time":1370864176}

```
